## Objectives
- Describe the differences between for-profit and not-for-profit hospitals
- Link historical patterns of U.S. hospital care to current issues
- Define and explain the differences between hospital prices, charges, and costs
- Understand variation in hospital pricing and investigate price variation with the Health Care Pricing Project materials
